name: PreRip
description:
Sort souls of fallen people: demons go to hell and decent folks go to - you guessed it! The heaven! Try to correctly sort souls and gain as much karma as possible before the death spike. At the same time, you will get penalty for every misplaced and missed person. See how long you can keep this up.

This project was designed and developed as a hypercasual game for mobile platforms. That's why the game is in the portrait orientation and has build-in touch controls. Leave a comment if you want to get a mobile version for your smartphone.

Created by:

  • Timur Abdrakhimov
  • Zhanna Bolshakova
  • Daniil Chebotkov

Game Engine:

  • Unity

Tutorial & Controls:

  • Use mouse cursor to control the sacred book that has the power to reflect player's judgement. To send souls to heaven make them fly to the right. The hell is to the left.

Credits:

  • Music by Yaroslav Serdtsev

This game was made for Indicator Game Jam 2019 (Saint Petersburg). The jam topic - reflection.
